Bank of England: This workbook is used for the article "The financial position of British households: evidence from the 2017 NMG Consulting survey" published in the 2016 Q4 Bank of England Quarterly Bulletin
This workbook contains data from the online NMG Consulting surveys only. 2004 - 2011 data from the face-to-face NMG Consulting surveys can be found  at:

X__2: Note 2014-2017 data is for H2 survey only

Variables ending "_m" are calculated using the point estimates reported by households.  For households that were unable or unwilling to provide point estimates, and instead reported a range for that variable, the "_m" variables take the mid-point of the reported range.

Workbook owner(s):: Alternative data formats are available on request
